Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was cancelled due to rain, preventing José Ramírez from attempting to hit his 40th home run and join the exclusive 40-40 club.
The Cleveland Guardians finished the season with a 92-69 record and will host an ALDS game on Oct. 5.
The Houston Astros will host an AL wild-card series at home on Tuesday, and will play either the Astros or Detroit Tigers.
Others: José Ramírez finished with 39 homers, leaving him short of becoming the seventh player in MLB history to hit 40 homers and steal 40 bases in the same season.
Cleveland's jump in the standings after winning 76 games in 2023 led to a bump in attendance as the Guardians drew more than 2 million fans at home for the first time since 2017.
